content: देहिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [देह-इनि] Incarnate, embodied. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A living being, especially a man; त्वदधीनं खलु देहिनां सुखं <ls>Ku. 4. 10</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 46</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 13</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">17. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 30</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 49.</ls> {@--2@} The soul, spirit (enshrined in the body); तथा शरीराणि विहाय जीर्णान्यन्यानि संयाति नवानि देही <ls>Bg. 2. 22</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">5. 13.</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 5.</ls> --नी The earth.
